title: Need to know this Font »FALADO«
content:
Hey guys,  
just found this nice poster/ design at the internet and was wondering what the name of the font could be?  
already tried all of this »type-identifing-machines« at the iNet but without success.  
I hope anybody of u can help me!!!  
thanks a lot!  
cheers  
flo

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817053505im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tumblr_mkztkdguqL1qbobf6o1_500_4584.jpg)
author: FloMo

comments.content: I think they started with [Carlton](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817053505/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/itc/carlton/) See [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20130817053505/http:/myfonts.us/td-uzTG55) for the alternate A.
